metadata.name: Fabric e1 - calg
metadata.description:
# Fabric 

https://dev.musicfortraders.com/5161l5592c30670e1876b6fc5575898025b322a3?e=1 

*FABRIC* is a galactic dance conducted by the movement and swings of the price of Ethereum. We set out to create a synesthetic work as an alternative to watching a chart. Continually providing a (sixth) sense of price developments.

The Ethereum price updates every block from the TWAP of Uniswap's Ethereum DAI and USDC price pairs. We use an EMA derived calculation to create a sense of price volatility and directionality.



### Sigils
 *remote, 2021.01.22*

*digital generative real-time 3d and audio*


*limited edition 1 of 6*
